title: Simon Geros
text:
Simon Geros is a Samoan former professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who played in the 1990s, 2000s and 2010s who represented <a href="Samoa%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">Samoa</a> in the <a href="2000%20Rugby%20League%20World%20Cup">2000 World Cup</a>.
Playing career.
Geros played for the <a href="Burleigh%20Bears">Burleigh Bears</a> when in 2000 he was selected for <a href="Samoa%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">Samoa</a> in the <a href="2000%20Rugby%20League%20World%20Cup">World Cup</a>. He stayed with the Bears in the 2001 <a href="Queensland%20Cup">Queensland Cup</a>.
In 2002 he was part of the <a href="Northern%20Eagles">Northern Eagles</a> franchise and played in the <a href="NSWRL%20Premier%20League">NSWRL Premier League</a>.
He then went on to play for the Valley United Spartans where he played a club record 450 games over 15 seasons.
